name: CJ Affiliate Export plugin
author: Cimpleo

sections.description:
CJ Affiliate by Conversant (formerly Commission Junction) is the leading global affiliate marketing network, specializing in pay-for-performance programs that drive results for businesses around the world.
Our plugin helps you to connect WordPress website to CJ Affiliate. The main task of the plugin is to transfer (export) data to CJ system.
At the moment you can choose export file format (XML, CSV) and we can offer you export PRODUCTS through three methods.
1) Via FTP.
2) Via Email.
3) Download export file.

Currently we support the following Data in file:
1.name
2.keywords
3.description
4.sku
5.buyurl
6.price
7.currency
8.startdate
9.instock
10.available
11.imageurl
12.advertisercategory

Notice.
If you want new data added in export file, please write us and we will do this!

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Tools->CJ Export screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Tools->CJ Export screen to configure the plugin

How can i change query for export?

We add wordpress filter ( filter_cjquery_args ) for query args.

What data will be written to the export file?

Currently we support the following Data in file:
1.name
2.keywords
3.description
4.sku
5.buyurl
6.price
7.currency
8.startdate
9.instock
10.available
11.imageurl
12.advertisercategory
Notice.
If you want new data added in export file, please write us and we will do this!
